definition: lit. Buddha jumps over the wall, name for a Chinese dish that uses many non-vegetarian ingredients
to jump/to hop/to skip over/to bounce/to palpitate

sentences.english: "Fotiaoqiang" has been used to entertain leaders of different nations for many times as the main course of state banquet.
sentences.chinese: “佛跳牆”曾多次作爲國宴的主菜招待各國領導人。

sentences.english: A crock filled with sea cucumber and other high-priced goodies?
sentences.chinese: 海蔘和其它高級食材匯聚的“佛跳牆”？

sentences.english: Jumping Over the Wall"has long enjoyed a good reputation in the world."
sentences.chinese: 中國名菜“佛跳牆”在世界上久享盛名。

definition: chicken in rice wine/also translated drunken chicken
Cantonese poached chicken, known as "white cut chicken"
rice in gravy, typically with meat and vegetables
Sichuan noodles with a spicy and numbing sauce
brand of Hong Kong instant noodles/also used as term for instant noodles in general
Cantonese poached chicken, known as "white cut chicken"
